mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM advance_tickets WHERE advanceTicketNumber = #{advanceTicketNumber} AND used = false AND expiresAt > NOW()
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM registered_advance_tickets WHERE advanceTicketId = (SELECT id FROM advance_tickets WHERE advanceTicketNumber = #{advanceTicketNumber})

SELECT at.advanceTicketNumber, at.expiresAt, at.used FROM advance_tickets at JOIN registered_advance_tickets rat ON at.id = rat.advanceTicketId WHERE rat.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY at.expiresAt DESC

AND at.used = false AND at.expiresAt > NOW()

SELECT id, advanceTicketNumber, DATE_FORMAT(expiresAt, '%Y.%m.%d까지') AS formattedExpiresAt FROM advance_tickets WHERE advanceTicketNumber = #{advanceTicketNumber}
